response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations and efficiency. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $10,000 to you. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire an asset that could potentially increase your business's value. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
